## Mircoarray
### Summary
1. a collection of microscopic DNA spots attached to a solid surface
2. to measure the expression levels of large numbers of genes simultaneously or to genotype multiple regions of a genome
3. short section of a gene or other DNA element that are used to hybridize a cDNA or cRNA (also called anti-sense RNA) sample (called target) under high-stringency conditions

### References
1.[Gene Expression](https://dmoztools.net/Science/Biology/Biochemistry_and_Molecular_Biology/Gene_Expression/)
2.[PLoS Biology Primer: Microarray Analysis](http://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article?id=10.1371/journal.pbio.0000015)
3.[Rundown of microarray technology](https://www.genome.gov/page.cfm?pageID=10000533)
